org.hibernate.testing.junit5

Class SessionFactoryScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.testing.junit5.SessionFactoryScope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DialectAccess, SessionFactoryAccess

    public class SessionFactoryScope
extends Object
implements SessionFactoryAccess
    A scope or holder fot the SessionFactory instance associated with a given test class. Used to: * provide lifecycle management related to the SessionFactory * access to functional programming using a Session generated from that SessionFactory
